description:
Always helpful, Sergeant Keroro renovates the Hinata family`s house for them when they mention that they wish they could do renovations.  It`s rather not what they expected or wanted, though!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attention, travaux exceptionnels / Le duel du destin
ケロロ 大改造! リフォームは劇的に であります / ドロロ いざまいる! 宿命の対決 であります
